chunk_id: Care During Pregnancy and Childbirth Training Manual for CHO at AB-HWC__chunk_48
source: Care During Pregnancy and Childbirth Training Manual for CHO at AB-HWC
text:
registration (Refer Section 2.4)
 ∙ History taking
 ∙ Physical examination (Weight, BP, pallor, respiratory rate, edema)
 ∙ Abdominal palpation
 ∙ Vaginal examination
 ∙ Laboratory investigations – Hb, Urine for sugar and proteins, Rapid testing for Syphilis screening, tieup with 
nearest ICTC/PPTCT Centre for: Rapid testing kits for HIV screening and Referral and management of +ve 
cases, OGTT testing for Gestational Diabetes, Ultrasound etc.
 ∙ Optional Investigations – Hepatitis B and Austral
